title: Kenya turns to its mobile money dominance to stem the spread of COVID
description: Kenyas largest teleco  Safaricom  will implement a fee waiver on East Africas leading mobile money product  M Pesa  to reduce the physical exchange of currency in response to the COVID   outbreak  The company announced that all person to person  P P  trans
